# pause()

**Instance Method**

Pauses playback of the current item.

## Declaration

```swift
func pause()
```

## Discussion

If the current item isn’t playing, this method has no effect. To resume playback of the current item from the pause point, call the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaPlayback/play()] method.

## Starting and stopping playback

- **play()**: Initiates playback of the current item.
- **stop()**: Ends playback of the current item.
- **prepareToPlay()**: Prepares a media player for playback.
- **isPreparedToPlay**: A Boolean value indicating whether a media player is ready to play.
